title: WATCH: Mohale surprises husband Somizi on their one-month wedding anniversary
text:
WATCH: Mohale surprises husband Somizi on their one-month wedding anniversary share this

Cape Town - It’s been one month since entertainer Somizi and his husband Mohale had their breathtaking traditional wedding ceremony – and for the lavish couple, this calls for a celebration.

READ MORE: PICS: Somizi and Mohale's lavish traditional wedding

Mohale went all out to surprise Somizi with an overnight stay at a luxurious hotel to celebrate their one-month anniversary as a married couple.

Taking to his Instagram page, Somizi shared how he was not happy with his husband for not wishing him a happy one-month wedding anniversary, only to be surprised with the romantic gesture later.

Somizi shared videos of their luxury getaway.

“My husband outdid himself. I’m speechless thank u baby I love love love you My husband outdid himself thank u so much baby I love love love you Mohale Motaung Mhlongo, [sic]” he wrote.

READ MORE: Mohale hits back at troll who accused him of never buying Somizi gifts

Watch the video here:

Somizi is quite the romantic and has previous surprised Mohale with a number of gifts.

From booking him a trip to New York (which ended up being to Italy) for his birthday to getting him 100 roses to celebrate 100 hours of their marriage, Somgaga goes all out.

Because of this, Mohale was accused of not doing the same for Somizi by social media users.
description: Mohale went all out to surprise Somizi with an overnight stay at a luxurious hotel to celebrate their one-month anniversary as a married couple.
